label: とわずがたり
対訳語: The Confessions of Lady Nijo, ca. 1310?
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Memoirs of a lady-in-waiting and mistress to Retired Emperor Go-Fukakusa, covering the years 1271-1306. Used as a source by author of Masukagami. [後深草院]
